content: this cowl is knit in the round beginning and ending with rib it is meant to be a quick and easy gift knit and my gift to you is to make it a free pattern this is a great pattern for men women and kids yarn 100g/106 yds bulky weight yarn * sample uses 1 skein polka dot sheep big sky bulky in tally lake one size finished measurements 22 circumference and 10 tall
